en.title: FE Event Manila, Philippines, 08th November 2008 (1).
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Every Nation Leadership Institute, Manila, Philippines was a GREAT SUCCESS with around 450 Members, Leaders, VIPs and Invited Guests. Among the VIPs were Zorah Andams, former Miss Philippines, runner up Miss Universe and now TV personality. Zorah is an FE member, QP wearer and great supporter of  "Christmas For Payatas". Other VIPs include TV and Movie (Lalola) Superstar Rhian Ramos, Celebrity Rebecca Padilla (who is the sister of Filipino Superstar Robin Padilla), Basketball Legend Alvin Patrimonio, Rosemarie Basa (Chairwoman Real Estate Festival, Philippines) and Muhammad Syukur Ismail (Second Secretary Embassy of Malaysia).

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Entertainment by Guy Gonzales and Band.

- Opening Speech by Jeremy Looi, Country Licensee Philippines.

- Speech by FE CEO, Paul Ting, who spoke on  FE's Vision and Strategies for 2009. Paul introduces the term "VELOCITY", which is SPEED with DIRECTION. To be successfully, one not only need DIRECTION. SPEED of execution is essential and in almost all cases a sense of URGENCY can make the difference between success and failure. FE Leaders, take heed. Success does not follow the slow!

- Sharing by Zorah Andams on "Christmas for Payatas" and appearance by Mary Rose, 14 years old scavenger on the Smoky Mountains of Payatas. There was hardly a dry eye in the audience!

- Demonstrations on the power of FE's Quantum Pendant by Presidential Director KC Phoon, including lifting of Alvin Patrimonio. Newcomers, as usual, were amazed by the demonstration!

- Testimonial Sharing by FE Spokesman and Basketball Legend, Alvin Patrimonio.

- Video Sharing and Testimonial by FE Spokesmen Samboy Lim, Allan Caidic (who have an outstation Basketball match) and Monsour Del Rosario (who is having a film shoot).

- Installation of new Presidential Directors, Executive Directors and Directors.  Congratulations, especially to new PDs Pastor Arthur Medina, Judge Lorenzo (who shared the account) and Engr Eliseo T Demafelis.! You made it and MUCH MORE to come!

- Recognition of New Stockiest.

- Presentation of FE's Quantum Pendant, Quantum Flask and Quantum Bracelet to Daisy Rivera, Philippines National Chess Master who will be representing Philippines at the 38th World Chess Olympiad in Germany 12th - 25th November 2008. Daisy is also a supporter of "Christmas For Payatas". FE wishes Daisy Great Success at the World Chess Olympiad!

- Closing Speech by PD KC Phoon who as usual was truly inspirational! Thank you , KC!

- Lucky Draws.

A BIG THANK YOU to FE Leaders, Dr Anarie Reyes and Effren Fortuna for a GREAT job MCing the Event! You guys have so much energy, bounce and enthusiasm (must be the QP!).

Among the VIPs were Zorah Andams, former Miss Philippines, runner up Miss Universe and now TV personality. Zorah is an FE member, QP wearer and great supporter of "Christmas For Payatas".
